page.title: 20OUR DOMESDAY STUDY, BOURNE
page.content: The 1985 "Domesday Study Project"has been undertaken by{approximately 200 {children}spread over six classes from three of the town's{schools,}Bourne County Primary, Bourne Grammar and Bourne Westfield County Primary. The work at{Bourne County Primary,} including Text Pages 2,3,7,8,10,13,15, 16,17,18 and 20, was undertaken by Classes 3P and 4R and their respective class teachers, Mrs.A. Powell and Mrs.J. Read. The children in Forms 2X and 2Y at {Bourne Grammar School,}Text Pages 14 and 19, were led by Miss D. Turp and Mr.J. Williams. Finally, responsible for Text Pages 1,4,5,6,9,11 and 12, were the children of J4W and J4M at{Westfield County } {Primary}and their teachers, Mrs.D. Wallis and Miss M. Moulton.
